sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' export class About extends Component { render() { return (

Kim Sarkeesian

Sola Salon

Stylist


All products used and sold in our studio is eco-friendly and cruelty-free. Our color line, Color.me has been created with naturally beneficial ingredients that help moisturise and rejuvenate the hair, while imparting incredible shine and colour – all without stressing or causing harm to the environment. What goes inside the tube is just as important as the color it creates. The choices we made are PPD free, Ammonia free and naturally derived ingredients. Our product line, usmooth is color safe, sulfate free, paraben free, cruelty free, along with gluten free options. Infused with sunflower oil, a natural moisturizer and UV protectant, usmooth will restore hair's strength, vitality and shine.

I have offered a wide range of hair styling services for over 20 years. I offer cutting, styling, coloring, texturing and treatments for hair of all types. Every appointment starts with a free consultation to find out just how you want to look and feel your best.

I take pride in having loyal customers who return to my salon. I'm not happy until you are! I regularly take classes to learn the latest techniques to keep your hair modern and healthy. My training includes classes at L’Oreal Professional Academy SoHo, NY, Vidal Sassoon Academy Santa Monica, CA, Sebastian International Woodland Hills, CA, American Crew Kansas City, Mo, Toni & Guy Academy Santa Monica, CA, Keratin Complex Smoothing Therapy Kansas City, Ks and with advance color theory from Schwarzkopf. From classic styles to contemporary fashions, I know how to do it all.

I'm committed to providing you with the highest quality hair care services. Let me help you create a style that will improve the look, feel and quality of your hair, making you feel renewed and glamorous.


) } } export default About
